synopsis.text: High school tennis club members embark on a series of unconventional adventures in this comedic anime, with tennis matches being a rare occurrence. In the second season of Teekyuu, the four girls from Kameido High find themselves in various predicaments, including assisting at a daycare center and competing in a baseball game against the baseball club to protect their court. The series captures the humor and chaos of their daily lives, with tennis occasionally making an appearance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
